name: Build your own house in an on-chain game
description:
Hands-on coding session for anyone with a creative streak (as long as you can find your command line).

We'll guide people through loading the game Downstream, downloading our command line tool and example code, modifying that to create their own custom building, then deploying that and visiting it in game. (And absolutely not attacking other people's buildings, that would be rude).

We'll explore a few different things you can make these buildings do, from simple item factories to the more weird and wonderful, including making games for other people to play.

speakers.name: Iain Gilfeather
speakers.bio: Iain Gilfeather is one of the founders of Playmint, a game development studio working on Downstream, a fully on-chain extendable multiplayer game.  Iain is a games programmer and development leader working in games for 24 years across multiple platforms and a range of team sizes.
